title: Summer Tech Conference 2026
excerpt: Join us for a day of inspiring talks, workshops, and networking with tech enthusiasts from around the world.
description: The Summer Tech Conference 2026 brings together innovators, developers, and technology leaders for a full day of learning and collaboration. Featuring keynote speakers from leading tech companies, hands-on workshops, and networking opportunities.
location: Tech Hub Convention Center, San Francisco

title: Web Design Workshop
excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of modern web design with hands-on exercises and expert guidance.
description: A comprehensive workshop covering the principles of effective web design, from color theory and typography to responsive layouts and user experience. Perfect for beginners and intermediate designers looking to enhance their skills.

title: Open Source Meetup
excerpt: Connect with fellow open source contributors and learn about exciting new projects.
description: Monthly meetup for open source enthusiasts to share projects, discuss best practices, and collaborate on new ideas. Whether you're a seasoned contributor or just getting started, everyone is welcome!

title: React Masterclass
excerpt: Deep dive into advanced React patterns and best practices with industry experts.
description: This intensive masterclass covers advanced React concepts including performance optimization, state management patterns, server components, and testing strategies. Ideal for developers with React experience looking to level up their skills.

title: AI & Machine Learning Summit
excerpt: Explore the latest trends and innovations in artificial intelligence and machine learning.
description: Join leading AI researchers and practitioners for a comprehensive summit covering cutting-edge developments in machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and ethical AI. Features hands-on labs and real-world case studies.

title: UX Research Methods Workshop
excerpt: Master the essential techniques for conducting effective user research.
description: Learn proven methods for understanding user needs, conducting interviews, usability testing, and synthesizing research findings into actionable insights. Includes practical exercises and templates you can use immediately.
